dialogue.text: Ahahahahaha…...
Mwahahahahahaha!
AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!
WHAT THE EVER LOVING FUCK?!
BEEEEEEEEEEEP!!!
You did such an amazing job dearie.~
Unfortunately, in this world… we can’'t always have happy endings. Such a shame, you and your little girlfriend were so cute together.~
BEHOLD MY TRUE SELF AND WITHER IN FEAR OF THE TRUE POWER OF THE YOUKAI OF BOUNDARIES!!!
Yukari opens up gaps in front of BF and GF as lasers start to charge. When the lasers fire...
...all that comes out is confetti and a cute little party horn noise as Yukari turns back to her normal self.
Ahahahaha...… amazing. Your power is no tall tale.
Wait, you aren'’t going to kill us? What was with that… thing we just saw?!
I thought for sure you would'’ve had a third song angry transformation!
Oh, I'm so offended!
Did you really think that I would fall under such cliches?
And I thought I could call you my dear friends because I know you so well.
We literally just met you a few hours ago...… I think. Time is so confusing here…...
Oh, hush. Besides,\nwhy would I be so aggravated when this is such an intriguing and fun hobby to do!
I should introduce Ran to this. I know that she would love it.
Being in this weird dimension...… it'’s making me feel weak...… something is draining me. I can'’t exactly describe why.
Beep boop!
Such a courageous young man, so willing to protect his girl. Reminds me of a couple that I once knew.
Unfortunately, their love was cut far too short.
In this realm that I call my home, everything is in a constant state of existing and not existing,
space is meaningless and the meaning of life and death is nothing more than a mere memory, making this place a Necrofantasia.
